name: Castelli Classifica Jersey - Men's
description: A performance jersey for clocking hours in the saddle. This jersey won't be out of place on weekend group rides or solo spins. The breathable fabric ensures you'll stay cool. All the details are covered from back drop-in pockets to a hem that stays in place.Micro-piqué fabric is soft, moisture wicking and highly breathable.Gripped hem with a drop tail provides good coverage.Full length YKK® Vislon zipper lets you vent.
